clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of GVG for the Treatment of Methamphetamine Dependence
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1 Study of Vigabatrin (GVG) for Methamphetamine Dependence

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to find out if GVG can reduce drug use and determine safety and effects of GVG when used together with methamphetamine. This study involves staying in the hospital for 21 days. Participants will receive either placebo or GVG, and a limited amount if methamphetamine will be injected on some study days. This study will enroll people that use methamphetamine. Participants will be compensated.
